XIII.ii.2.B.1.a
.
Certifying Civil Service Disability Preference
For the purpose of certifying civil service disability preference, a service-connected (SC) disability may be assigned an evaluation of “
less than ten percent
” for any directly or presumptively SC disease or injury that exhibits some extent of actual impairment.
Reference
:  For more information on the definition of Veterans’ preference, see
M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart ii, 2.A
.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B - Ratings for Veterans' Civil Service Disability Preference
